content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Dixit.

Written by Abhishek Dixit.

Cast Prit Kamani(Namit Gupta). Simran Sharma(Manjari Mishra). Anshuman Malhotra(Abeer Khan). Tushar Pandey(Surjo Kumar Pandey). Veebha Anand(Savita – Surjo’s Wife (as Vibha Anand)). Jatin Goswami(Ravikant – Manjari’s Brother). Jagat Rawat(Namit’s Father). Himani Sharma(ICCU Doctor). Sonal Jha(Abeer’s Mother). Shailesh Datar(Abeer’s Father). Jayshankar Tripathi(Surjo’s Father). Sushant Mohindru(Armaan). Shahnawaz Pradhan(Manjari’s Father). Amit Kumar Jha(Armaan Gang Boy 1). Farhan Kaushar(Armaan Gang Boy 2). Jatin(Armaan Gang Boy 3). Varun Raj Sharma(Armaan Gang Boy 4). Vishal Raj Sharma(Armaan Gang Boy 5). Sachin Gupta(Armaan Gang Boy 6) . Manasi Bedekar(Noor Siddique). Pooja Chaubey(ICCU Nurse). Apoorva Choudhary(Dr. Jain). Indrapreet(Professor Pillai). Girish Jain(Manjari’s Phupha Ji). Mohammad Salman Khan(Salman). Pankaj Kumar(Surjo’s Patient). Himanshu Malhotra(Aarambh – Manjari’s Husband (as Himanshu Ashok Malhotra)). Sonali Naik(Kanak Mishra / Manjari’s Bua). Alok Pandey(Vikram yadav). Vikash Rajput(Vikash Rajput). Manu Rawat(Hospital Receptionist). Shivani Saumya(Manjari’s Friend). Daksha Sharma(Dean – Mridula Verma). Sanjay Sharma(Aarambh’s Doctor). Amandeep Singh(Friend). Awriti Singh(Receptionist). K.R. Subramanian(Man In Bus). Lucky Tomar(Conductor)

Language Hindi.

Producers Ajit Kumar Barjatya. Avnish Barjatya. Kamal Kumar Barjatya. Rajkumar Barjatya. Sooraj R. Barjatya. Vikas Gaurh. Surabhi Horo. Dhanashree Mehta. Gudit Singh. Gyanendra Singh. Joga Singh. Sanjay Singh.

Production Rajshri Production.
